info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 4:18PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WITH TORRENTIAL RAINFALL WILL IMPACT CENTRAL ANDERSON COUNTY UNTIL 500 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with torrential rainfall near Anderson, or near Northlake. This storm was nearly stationary. Locations to be impacted include... Anderson and Northlake. Rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.
